column4: Anyone know if there's a key combination I can type in Gnome to bring up an application text box launcher wherein I type in the name of the application to launch and it runs it?
Anyone know the name of a calculator app that displays a scrollable log of calculations?  (Kind of like a TI graphing calculator)
you could use wxmaxima, it may be a bit of overkill though, depending on what you want to do
I vaguely remember using something in GNU/Linux that wasn't overkill at all, just the basic calculator app but with a log.
